title: Episode 292: Tears for Fears

title: Episode 291: Lizzo
description: “Still Bad” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Lizzo is a Grammy- and Emmy-winning singer, rapper, songwriter, and actress. title: Live Nation to Lease 5,000-Seat Music Venue at Downtown Atlanta Development
description: The venue will be part of Centennial Yards, a mixed-use development being built around Mercedes-Benz Stadium and State Farm Arena.
author: Glenn Peoples

title: Florida Can’t Enforce Anti-Drag Ban, Says Appeals Court, Upholding Earlier Decision
description: The Eleventh Circuit says Florida’s so-called Protection of Children Act “wields a shotgun when the First Amendment allows a scalpel at most.”
author: Rachel Scharf

title: Krysten Ritter Returning as Jessica Jones for Daredevil: Born Again Season 2
description: Krysten Ritter is returning to the role of Jessica Jones in the upcoming second season of Daredevil: Born Again, Variety reports. “I’m so excited to bring back this iconic character, and without giving too much away, there is much more in store for Jessica Jones. This is going to be an incredible season!” the star […] Krysten Ritter Returning as Jessica Jones for Daredevil: Born Again Season 2 Liz Shannon Miller

title: Spinal Tap Creators Announce New Book Ahead of Film’s Sequel
description: The book will also feature stories and “Spinal Tap moments” from real rock stars, like Slash, Rob Halford, Tina Weymouth, and more. Spinal Tap Creators Announce New Book Ahead of Film’s Sequel Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito

title: Insomniac Launches New Streaming App With Exclusive Live Sets and DJ Radio Shows
description: The new Insomniac Radio app offers 24/7 ad-free dance music, live festival broadcasts and exclusive shows hosted by the biggest names in electronic dance music.
author: Cameron Sunkel

title: 14% Say EDM is Their "Go-To Genre" When Feeling Depressed, Study Suggests
description: EDM’s euphoric waves are crashing over despair, with 14% of Americans seeking out the music of Avicii, Calvin Harris and Daft Punk, among others.
author: Jason Heffler
